description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fcfqf","text":"The protocol was published on behalf of the investigators by the SPARC project team. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21ljv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmebi","text":"The University of Toledo Health Science Campus animal care and use committee approved animal care, breeding procedures, and experimental protocols. Animals were housed in an Association of Laboratory animal Care-approved facility with a 12-hour light cycle with food (standard chow) and water ad libitum.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ceojg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2tig","text":"One male VIP-GCAmP reporter mouse, age 4 months, was used in this study. The mouse was purchased from the Jackson Laboratories, and all genotyping was performed using primers recommended by the Jackson Laboratories according to their protocols. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fq1b7","text":"Pinn the colon segment mucosal side down onto a Sylgard surface lining a glass coverslip attached to the bottom of a plastic imaging chamber containing artificial CSF perfused and bubbled with Carbogen (95% O2/5% CO2) to oxygenate and achieve  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":208,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":215,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":243,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"44k49","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3esnt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B1B5820FA4A711EC9DBA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"number":"7.4"}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":139}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"f2e1a","text":"In experiments that involve recording neural activity leading up to spontaneous Colonic Motor Complexes (CMCs) heat the artificial CSF  to   .","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B9858D85A4A711EC9DBA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"35","unit":10},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"}}}}}}

Artificial CSF with test reagents, e.g., agonists.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":5,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dbvpk","text":"Detect GCaMP-positive neurons by their basal Ca2+ fluorescence.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":47,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"coh2s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f62dt","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9093a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"67vm4","text":"To do this we used an upright DM6000 FS Leica fluorescence microscope (Leica, Buffalo Grove, IL) and Prime 95B Scientific CMOS camera (Photometrics, Tucson, AZ).","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2mhl8","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6f6mj","text":"Images were collected with Metamorph software (Molecular Devices, Downington, PA) at a 40-Hz sampling rate and 25-ms exposure time.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9g25d","text":"Open the excised proximal colon segment along the mesenteric border.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d447g","text":"At second 20 focally deliver an agonist by pressure microperfusion (10psi,10 sec; via Picospritzer II; Parker Instrumentation Corp, Barnstaple, UK) from blunt glass micropipettes (diameter, 5–10 mm) delivered within 50 µm of an adjacent myenteric ganglion.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7o6g2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7uq1q","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"92d6d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":48}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"br2lb","text":"Here we used  dimethylphenyl-piperazinum (DMPP)  .","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"4D3C7BF0A4B811ECAFDD3D7FF764F243","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"concentration"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6sjt5","text":"Record spontaneous and evoked changes in GCaMP6f-mediated Ca2+ fluorescence intensity.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":60,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aq0d0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ehfdn","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fpsbu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"32svv","text":"We acquired 12-bit images using a 1.44-megapixel CMOS camera capable of capturing at 40 frames/sec (Prime 95B; Teledyne Photometrics, Tuscon, AZ) controlled by Meta-Morph software (version 7.10.1.161; Molecular Devices, Silicon Valley, CA).","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
